price: 54. Mpe soki alongoli mabe mana likolo lia bino, okomona basusu kati na bino babandi kosangisa Nkolo wa bango.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا كَشَفَ ٱلضُّرَّ عَنكُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنكُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma idhā kashafa al-ḍura ʿankum idhā farīqun minkum birabbihim yush'rikūna
